quote: With one Yes vote in hospital & very positive signs from Alaska and two others (McCain is out), we have the HCare Vote, but not for Friday!
quotePlain: With one Yes vote in hospital & very positive signs from Alaska and two others (McCain is out), we have the HCare Vote, but not for Friday!
name: Donald Trump

claims.title: Republicans had enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy
claims.negative: Republicans did not have enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy
claims.negativePlain: Republicans did not have enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy

claims.title: Thad Cochran couldn't vote on a healthcare bill since he was in the hospital
claims.negative: Thad Cochran wasn't in the hospital and could have voted on a healthcare bill
claims.negativePlain: Thad Cochran wasn’t in the hospital and could have voted on a healthcare bill
claims.truth: He was recovering at home, not in a hospital, and would have made arrangements to vote.
claims.truthPlain: He was recovering at home, not in a hospital, and would have made arrangements to vote.
